description: Smallest triangular number containing exactly n 1's.
maple: P := proc(q,h) local a,b,c,k,n; c:=0; for n from 1 to q do a:=0; b:=n*(n+1)/2;for k from 1 to ilog10(n*(n+1)/2)+1 do if (b mod 10)=h then a:=a+1; fi; b:=trunc(b/10);od; if a>c then c:=a; print(n*(n+1)/2); fi; od; end: P(10^9,1); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 08 2014
author: _David W. Wilson_
